panels.description:
cached + jvm Eden + jvm Free + jvm Old
一般cached数量稳定不变，查看Eden新生代jvm内存周期性变化即可看出jvm gc回收时间点，如果jvm free空间较大，可能需要调小jvm xmx内存

targets.expr: sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", unit="byte", pod=~"$pod"}) - sum by (pod) (label_replace(container_memory_usage_bytes{namespace="component",pod=~"$pod",container!="POD"},"pod","$1","pod","(.*)"))

panels.title: $pod 内存分布及垃圾回收

panels.description: 每秒读写硬盘数量，当前只针对foundry F1-8机型计算，其他机型计算不正确，会额外计入其他硬盘，SAS 盘iops是4块盘sum之后的结果，也有些超过理论值
panels.title: $pod  IOPS

panels.description:
cached + jvm Eden + jvm Free + jvm Old
一般cached数量稳定不变，查看Eden新生代jvm内存周期性变化即可看出jvm gc回收时间点，如果jvm free空间较大，可能需要调小jvm xmx内存

panels.title: $pod 内存分布及垃圾回收

panels.title: $pod  IOPS

panels.description: 创建表时定义，默认speculative_retry=99PERCENTILE 表示coordiantor 等待当前请求返回时间超过99% 平均返回时间后，尝试发送请求到其他节点，避免因为当前节点负载高或正在gc等原因一致等待返回，提高响应时间，此metric表示当前有多少请求是retry返回的，表明某些节点响应较慢
panels.title: speculative retries

panels.description:
wps表示每秒写入节点的hints数量
SendFrom表示从节点瞬时发送到hints对应目标节点的hints数量，即之前某些节点无响应积累一些hints文件，待目标节点恢复后一起发送
panels.title: Write/Sec & send current

panels.description: Time between when mutation is applied to base table and when CL.ONE is achieved on view.
panels.title: Write Form Base Table To View With CL.One

panels.description: Time taken during the local read of a materialized view update.
panels.title: Local Read Time When Update

panels.description: Time taken acquiring a partition lock for materialized view updates on this table
panels.title: Partition Lock Time When MV Update

panels.description:
Total number of attempted view replica writes.
Total number of succeded view replica writes.
ViewReplicasAttempted - ViewReplicasSuccess.
panels.title: MV Writes Tasks Status

panels.description: Number of times flush has resulted in the memtable being switched out.
panels.title: flush Times When memtable switched out

panels.description: Count-xxx-xxx  每个表当前的sstable数量
panels.title: sstable counts by  table

panels.description: 平均每秒执行的cql数，及prepared cql占所有cql比例
panels.title: CQL statements/ sec & prepared ratio
